---

_Bower fruit_ got its name from its association with [the Green Mother](/Deities.aspx?ID=93), a fey Eldest with a fondness for plants and manipulation, whose domain is known as the Hanging Bower. She uses these cursed fruits to keep mortals in her thrall, but it's unknown whether she created them or simply popularized their use.

 A _bower fruit_ condemns a non-[fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69) who tastes it to never again be satisfied with [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1) fare. Any fruit can be cursed in this manner, but stone fruits such as peaches, plums, mangoes, and lychees are most common. Upon activating a _bower fruit_ by eating it, the fruit casts a 6th-level [_feast of ashes_](/Spells.aspx?ID=575) on you (DC 30). This curse is permanent, but food from the [First World](/Planes.aspx?ID=10), rather than no food, can sate your accursed hunger. If you sate your hunger this way, you gain an [addiction](/Diseases.aspx?ID=15) as if First World food and drink were a drug for you (DC 30).
